titleStmt.title: A friendly epistle to the bishops and ministers of the Church of England for plain truth and sound peace between the pious Protestants of the Church of England and those of the baptised believers written with the advice of divers pastors and brethren of the baptised congregations, by Tho. Grantham.
titleStmt.author: Grantham, Thomas, 1634-1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
